001package csv2html;
002
003import java.io.BufferedWriter;
004import java.io.File;
005import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
006import java.io.FileOutputStream;
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
009import java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException;
010import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.Calendar;
013import java.util.List;
014
015import utility.StringUtility;
016
017/**
018 * ライタ：情報のテーブルをHTMLページとして書き出す。
019 * 
020 * @author Okayama Kodai (Created by Aoki Atsushi)
021 * @version 2.0.0
022 */
023public class Writer extends IO {
024    /**
025     * htmlのフッターに表示する作者の名前
026     */
027    public static final String htmlAuthor = "Okayama Kodai";
028
029    /**
030     * ライタのコンストラクタ。
031     * @param aTable テーブル
032     */
033    public Writer(Table aTable) {
034        super(aTable);
035
036        return;
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * HTMLページを基にするテーブルからインデックスファイル(index.html)に書き出す。
041     */
042    public void perform() {
043        Attributes attributes = this.attributes();
044        String fileStringOfHTML = attributes.baseDirectory() + attributes.indexHTML();
045        File aFile = new File(fileStringOfHTML);
046        try (FileOutputStream outputStream = new FileOutputStream(aFile);
047                OutputStreamWriter outputWriter = new OutputStreamWriter(outputStream, StringUtility.encodingSymbol());
048                BufferedWriter aWriter = new BufferedWriter(outputWriter);) {
049
050            this.writeHeaderOn(aWriter);
051            this.writeTableBodyOn(aWriter);
052            this.writeFooterOn(aWriter);
053
054        } catch (UnsupportedEncodingException | FileNotFoundException anException) {
055            anException.printStackTrace();
056        } catch (IOException anException) {
057            anException.printStackTrace();
058        }
059
060        return;
061    }
062
063    /**
064     * 属性リストを書き出す。
065     * @param aWriter ライタ
066     * @throws IOException 入出力エラーが発生した場合
067     */
068    public void writeAttributesOn(BufferedWriter aWriter) throws IOException {
069
070        aWriter.write("<tr>");
071        aWriter.newLine();
072        this.attributes().names().forEach((aName) -> {
073            try {
074                aWriter.write("<td class=\"center-pink\">");
075                aWriter.write("<strong>");
076                aWriter.write(aName);
077                aWriter.write("</strong>");
078                aWriter.write("</td>");
079                aWriter.newLine();
080            } catch (IOException exception) {
081                throw new RuntimeException(exception);
082            }
083        });
084        aWriter.write("</tr>");
085        aWriter.flush();
086
087        return;
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * フッタを書き出す。
092     * @param aWriter ライタ
093     * @throws IOException 入出力エラーが発生した場合
094     */
095    public void writeFooterOn(BufferedWriter aWriter) throws IOException {
096        Calendar aCalendar = Calendar.getInstance();
097        SimpleDateFormat aDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss");
098        String dateString = aDateFormat.format(aCalendar.getTime());
099        aWriter.write("<div class=\"right-small\">");
100        aWriter.write("Created by ");
101        aWriter.write(Writer.htmlAuthor);
102        aWriter.write(" (CSV2HTML written by Java) ");
103        aWriter.write(IO.htmlCanonicalString(dateString));
104        aWriter.write("</div>");
105        aWriter.newLine();
106        aWriter.write("</body>");
107        aWriter.newLine();
108        aWriter.write("</html>");
109        return;
110    }
111
112    /**
113     * ヘッダを書き出す。
114     * @param aWriter ライタ
115     * @throws IOException 入出力エラーが発生した場合
116     */
117    public void writeHeaderOn(BufferedWriter aWriter) throws IOException {
118        aWriter.write(
119                "<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN\" \"http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd\">");
120        aWriter.newLine();
121        aWriter.write("<html lang=\"ja\">");
122        aWriter.newLine();
123        aWriter.write(
124                """
125                        <head>
126                            <meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" content=\"text/html; charset=UTF-8\">
127                            <meta http-equiv=\"Content-Style-Type\" content=\"text/css\">
128                            <meta http-equiv=\"Content-Script-Type\" content=\"text/javascript\">
129                            <meta name=\"keywords\" content=\"Java,Oriented,Programming\">
130                        """);
131        aWriter.write(String.format("<meta name=\"description\" content=\"%s\">", super.attributes().titleString()));
132        aWriter.newLine();
133        aWriter.write(String.format("<meta name=\"author\" content=\"%s\">", Writer.htmlAuthor));
134        aWriter.write("""
135                <style type=\"text/css\">
136                <!--
137                body {
138                        background-color : #ffffff;
139                        margin : 20px;
140                        padding : 10px;
141                        font-family : serif;
142                        font-size : 10pt;
143                }
144                a {
145                        text-decoration : underline;
146                        color : #000000;
147                }
148                a:link {
149                        background-color : #ffddbb;
150                }
151                a:visited {
152                        background-color : #ccffcc;
153                }
154                a:hover {
155                        background-color : #dddddd;
156                }
157                a:active {
158                        background-color : #dddddd;
159                }
160                div.belt {
161                        background-color : #eeeeee;
162                        padding : 0px 4px;
163                }
164                div.right-small {
165                        text-align : right;
166                        font-size : 8pt;
167                }
168                img.borderless {
169                        border-width : 0px;
170                        vertical-align : middle;
171                }
172                table.belt {
173                        border-style : solid;
174                        border-width : 0px;
175                        border-color : #000000;
176                        background-color : #ffffff;
177                        padding : 0px 0px;
178                        width : 100%;
179                }
180                table.content {
181                        border-style : solid;
182                        border-width : 0px;
183                        border-color : #000000;
184                        padding : 2px 2px;
185                }
186                td.center-blue {
187                        padding : 2px 2px;
188                        text-align : center;
189                        background-color : #ddeeff;
190                }
191                td.center-pink {
192                        padding : 2px 2px;
193                        text-align : center;
194                        background-color : #ffddee;
195                }
196                td.center-yellow {
197                        padding : 2px 2px;
198                        text-align : center;
199                        background-color : #ffffcc;
200                }
201                -->
202                </style>
203                """);
204        aWriter.write(String.format("<title>%s</title>", super.attributes().titleString()));
205        aWriter.write("</head>");
206        aWriter.newLine();
207        aWriter.flush();
208        return;
209    }
210
211    /**
212     * ボディを書き出す。
213     * @param aWriter ライタ
214     * @throws IOException 入出力エラーが発生した場合
215     */
216    public void writeTableBodyOn(BufferedWriter aWriter) throws IOException {
217        aWriter.write("<body cz-shortcut-listen=\"true\">");
218        aWriter.newLine();
219        aWriter.write("<div class=\"belt\">");
220        aWriter.newLine();
221        aWriter.write("<h2>");
222        aWriter.write(super.attributes().captionString());
223        aWriter.write("</h2>");
224        aWriter.newLine();
225        aWriter.write("</div>");
226        aWriter.write("<table class=\"belt\" summary=\"table\">");
227        aWriter.write("<tbody>");
228        aWriter.write("<tr>");
229        aWriter.write("<td>");
230        aWriter.write("<table class=\"content\" summary=\"table\">");
231        aWriter.write("<tbody>");
232        aWriter.flush();
233
234        this.writeAttributesOn(aWriter);
235        this.writeTuplesOn(aWriter);
236
237        aWriter.write("</tbody>");
238        aWriter.write("</table>");
239        aWriter.write("</td>");
240        aWriter.write("</tr>");
241        aWriter.write("</tbody>");
242        aWriter.write("</table>");
243        aWriter.write("</hr>");
244
245        return;
246    }
247
248    /**
249     * タプル群を書き出す。
250     * @param aWriter ライタ
251     * @throws IOException 入出力エラーが発生した場合
252     */
253    public void writeTuplesOn(BufferedWriter aWriter) throws IOException {
254        //タプルの色を指定するHTMLのクラス属性の名前
255        List<String> classNames = new ArrayList<>();
256        classNames.add("center-blue");
257        classNames.add("center-yellow");
258
259        Integer index = 0;
260        Integer numberOfClasses = classNames.size();
261        for (Tuple aTuple : this.table().tuples()) {
262            String className = classNames.get(index);
263            aWriter.write("<tr>");
264            aWriter.newLine();
265            aTuple.values().forEach((aValue) -> {
266                try {
267                    aWriter.write("<td class=\"");
268                    aWriter.write(className);
269                    aWriter.write("\">");
270                    aWriter.write(aValue);
271                    aWriter.write("</td>");
272                    aWriter.newLine();
273                } catch (IOException exception) {
274                    throw new RuntimeException(exception);
275                }
276            });
277            aWriter.write("</tr>");
278            index = (index + 1) % numberOfClasses;
279        }
280        return;
281    }
282}
